title: Graded Card Boxes - Wood/Custom Built *IN STOCK*
author: jp1216

posts.post_title: Graded Card Boxes - Wood/Custom Built *IN STOCK*
posts.post_content:
Graded Card Boxes - Wood/Custom Built.  Back by popular demand!
Please see [url]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/url] for more information and other available card boxes.  
Designed to hold about 300 graded cards.  Pictured with 77 PSA slabs in a row (raw - no sleeves) or 67 PSA with sleeves.  
My father-in-law has built several 'T206' boxes and has now focused on the graded card boxes.  Right now, only the player on top lids are available.  Beautiful addition.  Price is $170 delivered for Net54 members. 
Quantity discounts.
PM me for more info or questions.  
[img]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com/uploads/6/1/2/8/6128218/1673314_orig.jpg[/img]
Updated the above post

Bump for Presale info.  Next batch of 10 will be ready on or about November 26th.
So far, feedback has been great!  A couple have already been spoken for....  PM me for info.
7-8 boxes remain.  Batch should be available for shipping before 12/1.  PM me for Net54 pricing info.
5 boxes remain. Ready to ship this week.  PM me for details.
Only 3 remain.  Great holiday gift!
Another small batch with only 2 remaining.  $155 delivered.  PM for information.
One left - please PM for details.
One remaining...

Last one (one each of the 'graded' and 'raw' card boxes remain).


**Now only one 'raw' card box remains - 'graded' boxes are sold**
Fresh new batch of 6 are available and ready to ship.  Please PM for details.
any available without the ball player silhouette on the lid by chance?
One 'Graded' box left from the 10/13 inventory.  T206/tobacco boxes are reduced too.  Please PM!
One remains - I think.....  PM to reserve it!

2/21/14: New Inventory just added. A few are ready to ship. Inventory includes 'Graded' boxes, 'Raw card' boxes and 'T206 - tobacco' boxes. Please refer to the first post for the latest info and PM if interested.
5/1:  All the different boxes are in stock and ready to ship.  Please PM first for the Net54 deals.
9/14 - a few more in stock and ready to ship.  PM first.
2 remaining for 2014.  PM if interested.

2/7 update:  After selling out before the holidays, a fresh batch of 8 boxes are ready to ship.
PM if interested in the Net54 discount.

Other styles available too.  See [url]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/url] for pictures.

7/21 Update:  (from my father-in-law) More boxes in stock and ready to ship.  Custom box orders are also being accepted.  Please refer to the first post in this thread for pricing and details.  PM for more info.
10/21/15 - boxes are back in stock and ready to ship.  PM if interested in the Net54 discount.
12/27/2015 - Updated inventory.  Boxes ready to ship.  PM first for Net54 discount.  See first post.
4/9/2016 - Another batch of boxes are finished.  Please see the first post and PM me for Net54 price/payment instructions.
8/29/16 - boxes are back in stock!  Please see the first post for pricing and discount information.
Fresh batch available on 11/27/16.  Please refer to the first post for details.  PM if interested.
4/17:  Fresh batch available.  Please refer to the first post for details. PM if interested.
